StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Senior Research Analyst with 2+ years of work exposure in Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Market Research, Strategy Consulting, Competitive Intelligence, Research Analysis, Strategic Management, Market Sizing, Business Development, Data Analytics.

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Research Analyst-Analytics
PositionHistory.Description: Organize, analyze, synthesize and summarize data and information (includes information on financials, strategy, events, company executives, etc.) related to pharma and medical devices Actively involved in client communication, scoping of project and user engagement activities Competitive intelligence consulting and insights analysis for Pharmaceutical majors to analyze their competitive market for generics, Biosimilars, API's and Biologics in various therapeutic areas Utilize secondary research sources (in addition to Contify platform) as well as primary to gather information to be used to develop strategic consulting projects.

PositionHistory.Title: Business Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Identification of target companies within the Pharmaceutical/Healthcare marketplace & identification of report specific indications through secondary research. Active role in report-specific client (based in the US, Europe and Asia-Pacific) communication targeted towards
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 81311424b61544c1001011702154e6&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681856 2/2/20 23&18
DelveInsight's services as well as assisting with business development RFPs and RFQs. Actively handled consulting projects through Primary and Secondary research for major pharmaceutical giants (e.g. Clinical Trial Analysis and insights for Dry Eye Syndrome and Dravet Syndrome) Preparation of client specific presentations and proposals & implementing effective marketing strategies.

PositionHistory.Title: E-Trainer
PositionHistory.Description: E-Workshops held on Next-Generation Sequencing Data Analysis (DNASeq & RNASeq), Molecular Dynamics and simulations.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 41% of this job

Degree.Comments: PG: MBA/PGDM (Competitive Intelligence and Strategic Management) from Amity University in 2019
UG: B.Tech/B.E. (bioinformatics) from AMITY Institute of Biotechnology, Noida in 2016

SpeakingEvent.Description: Preparation of client specific presentations and proposals & implementing effective marketing strategies
